data.title: Sisters of the Living Word film receives an Emmy
data.meta_description: "We are the Sisters of the Living Word" a short film produced by Bitter Jester Studios for the Arlington Heights-based order of Catholic women religious, received an Emmy for lighting at the Chicago ...
data.text:
"We are the Sisters of the Living Word" a short film produced by Bitter Jester Studios for the Arlington Heights-based order of Catholic women religious, received an Emmy for lighting at the Chicago Midwest Emmy Awards on Nov. 16.

Nicolas DeGrazia and Daniel Kullman are the owners of Bitter Jester Studios, and the creative team that produced this beautiful short film that shares the Sisters of the Living Word vision, mission, Core Values, and lives of service with the world. They were awarded an Emmy for lighting at the Chicago/Midwest Emmy Awards Nov. 16 at the Swissotel in Chicago. See more about the Sisters of the Living Word at www.slw.org. For more about Bitter Jesters Studios, see www.bitterjester.com
